page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
page.content: {MERCHANT TAYLORS' SCHOOL {Members of U4W for the leg - work {attendant on the Land - use and {Amenity surveys. {In particular,the following for their {individual efforts: {Bowden D, Craft A E, Essex D J, {Mayhew P J, Thompson A R. {HAREFIELD HISTORY SOCIETY {Allen G, Ashley P, Cuthbertson E, {Evans M, Leach W, Piercy K, Piercy L, {Thomas G, Woodward V. { {Thanks are also due to all the patient {people of Harefield who have answered {all sorts of seemingly irrelevant {questions. In particular, the {Harefield Hospital Administration, {the M.O.D. and Mr.R W Wiles. }
